title: Maintenance work on East West Line from Tanah Merah to Simei

updates.text: SMRT will be raising the threshold for rail change out from 14 mm to 12 mm to facilitate proactive rail replacement.
Preventive maintenance is critical & SMRT will make extensive checks across curved sections of rail.
[EWL] CLEARED: Trains are now operating normally.
The crack rail is secured by SMRT engineers. Est 15 mins of additional traveling time from #Clementi to #OutramPark toward #PasirRis.
[EWL] UPDATE: Due to a rail crack at #TiongBahru. Estimated 30 mins additional travel time from #JurongEast to #OutramPark toward #PasirRis.
[EWL] UPDATE: Due to a rail crack at #TiongBahru. Estimated 30 mins additional travel time from #JurongEast towards #OutramPark.
[EWL] UPDATE: Due to a rail crack at #TiongBahru. Estimated 20 mins additional travel time from #TiongBahru towards #OutramPark.
[EWL] Estimate 20 mins additional travel time from #TiongBahru towards #OutramPark due to track fault.
